cards.effect: Put up to 2 Supporter cards from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Passho Berry
cards.effect: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is damaged by an attack from your opponent's {W} Pokémon, it takes 60 less damage (after applying Weakness and Resistance), and discard this card.

cards.name: Precious Trolley
cards.effect: Search your deck for any number of Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Scramble Switch
cards.effect: Switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you do, you may move any amount of Energy from the Pokémon you moved to your Bench to the new Active Pokémon.

cards.name: Surfer
cards.effect: Switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you do, draw cards until you have 5 cards in your hand.

cards.name: Technical Machine: Fluorite
cards.effect: The Pokémon this card is attached to can use the attack on this card. (You still need the necessary Energy to use this attack.) If this card is attached to 1 of your Pokémon, discard it at the end of your turn.

cards.name: Tera Orb
cards.effect: Search your deck for a Tera Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Tyme
cards.effect: Tell your opponent the name of a Pokémon in your hand and put that Pokémon face down in front of you. Your opponent guesses that Pokémon's HP, and then you reveal it. If your opponent guessed right, they draw 4 cards. If they guessed wrong, you draw 4 cards. Then, return the Pokémon to your hand.

attacks.name: Precocious Evolution
attacks.effect: If you go first, you can use this attack during your first turn. Search your deck for a card that evolves from this Pokémon and put it onto this Pokémon to evolve it. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Evo-Powder
attacks.effect: For each of your Benched Pokémon, search your deck for a card that evolves from that Pokémon and put it onto that Pokémon to evolve it. Then, shuffle your deck.

abilities.name: Calming Light
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may make your opponent's Active Pokémon Asleep.

attacks.name: Spiral Rush
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Sunny Assist
attacks.effect: Move all Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Cursed Edge
attacks.effect: Discard all Special Energy from all of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Black Blaze Slash
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Leap Out
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Powder Snow
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

abilities.name: Counterattack
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 3 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Big Bite
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

abilities.name: Solid Body
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Paralyzing Crackle
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed, and discard an Energy from that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Skill Dive
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Full Heart
attacks.effect: Attach up to 2 Basic {P} Energy cards from your hand to your Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Guardian Burst
attacks.effect: If you don't have Uxie and Azelf on your Bench, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Screech
attacks.effect: During your next turn, the Defending Pokémon takes 50 more damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Slight Intrusion
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Trio-Cheehoo
attacks.effect: If you don't have exactly 3 cards in your hand, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Steel Wing
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Acidic Spit
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage for each damage counter on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Melting Sweetness
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Wild Tackle
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Take It Easy
attacks.effect: Heal 60 damage from this Pokémon. During your next turn, this Pokémon can't retreat.

abilities.name: Expert Hider
abilities.effect: If any damage is done to this Pokémon by attacks, flip a coin. If heads, prevent that damage.

attacks.name: Lick Whip
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Drag Off
attacks.effect: Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon to the Active Spot. This attack does 40 damage to the new Active Pokémon.

abilities.name: Sudden Shearing
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Vengeful Crush
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

abilities.name: Double Type
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is in play, it is {G} and {R} type.

attacks.name: Spicy Rage
attacks.effect: This attack does 70 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Sparkling Scales
abilities.effect: Prevent all damage from and effects of attacks from your opponent's Tera Pokémon done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hypno Splash
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Ice Age
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a {N} Pokémon, it is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Black Frost
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Resolute Heart
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon has full HP and would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, it is not Knocked Out, and its remaining HP becomes 10.

attacks.name: Topaz Bolt
attacks.effect: Discard 3 Energy from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Skyliner
abilities.effect: Your Basic Pokémon in play have no Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Eon Blade
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Sand Tomb
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

attacks.name: Barite Jail
attacks.effect: Put damage counters on each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon until its remaining HP is 100.

attacks.name: Reversing Storm
attacks.effect: You may switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sonic Peridot
attacks.effect: This attack does 100 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon ex and Pokémon V. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Crashing Headbutt
attacks.effect: Discard the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Obsidian
attacks.effect: This attack also does 130 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Assemble Alloy
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may attach up to 2 Basic {M} Energy cards from your discard pile to your {M} Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Metal Defender
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon has no Weakness.

attacks.name: Tropical Frenzy
attacks.effect: You may attach any number of Basic Energy cards from your hand to your Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Swinging Sphene
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, Knock Out your opponent's Active Basic Pokémon. If tails, Knock Out 1 of your opponent's Benched Basic Pokémon.

attacks.name: Surprise Pump
attacks.effect: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Cinnabar Lure
attacks.effect: Look at the top 10 cards of your deck. You may put any number of Pokémon you find there onto your Bench. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

abilities.name: Born to Slack
abilities.effect: If your opponent has no Pokémon ex or Pokémon V in play, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Great Swing
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Break Through
attacks.effect: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Zircon Road
attacks.effect: You may draw 5 cards.

cards.name: Clemont's Quick Wit
cards.effect: Heal 60 damage from each of your {L} Pokémon.

cards.name: Cyrano
cards.effect: Search your deck for up to 3 Pokémon ex, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Drasna
cards.effect: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, flip a coin. If heads, draw 8 cards. If tails, draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Drayton
cards.effect: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Pokémon and a Trainer card you find there and put them into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

cards.name: Jasmine's Gaze
cards.effect: During your opponent's next turn, all of your Pokémon take 30 less damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance). (This includes new Pokémon that come into play.)

cards.name: Lisia's Appeal
cards.effect: Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Basic Pokémon to the Active Spot. If you do, the new Active Pokémon is now Confused.

cards.name: Counter Gain
cards.effect: If you have more Prize cards remaining than your opponent, attacks used by the Pokémon this card is attached to cost {C} less.

cards.name: Gravity Mountain
cards.effect: Each Stage 2 Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's) gets -30 HP.

cards.name: Night Stretcher
